00058             function                __construct()
00059             {
00060                   try
00061                   {
00062                         $this->Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00063                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00064                         $this->Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00065                         $this->ScheduleAccess = get_package( 'schedule::schedule_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00066                         $this->ScheduleAlgorithms = get_package( 'schedule::schedule_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00067                   }
00068                   catch( Exception $e )
00069                   {
00070                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00100             function                process_task( $Parameters , $CurrentIteration )
00101             {
00102                   try
00103                   {
00104                         $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00105                         if( $this->Settings->get_setting( 'cron_ping' , '0' ) == 1 )
00106                         {
00107                               print( 'Cron ping' );
00108                               
00109                               return( $CurrentIteration + 1 );
00110                         }
00111                   }
00112                   catch( Exception $e )
00113                   {
00114                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00115                   }
00116             }
00117             
00136             function                process_single_task( $Task )
00137             {
00138                   try
00139                   {
00140                         $Package = get_package( $Task->package_name , $Task->package_version , __FILE__ );
00141                         $NextIteration = intval( 
00142                               call_user_func( array( $Package , 'process_task' ) , $Task->parameters , $Task->next_iteration )
00143                         );
00144                         
00145                         $IntervalField = $NextIteration == 0 ? 'time_step' : 'iteration_step';
00146                         
00147                         $this->Database->update( 
00148                               'umx_schedule' , 
00149                               array( 
00150                                     'processing' , 'next_processing_time' , '`count`' , 'archived' , 'next_iteration' 
00151                               ) , 
00152                               array( 
00153                                     0 , "DATE_ADD( NOW() , INTERVAL $IntervalField SECOND )" , 
00154                                     'IF( `count` > 1 , `count` - 1 , 1 )' , 'IF( type = 1 AND `count` = 1 , 1 , 0 )' , 
00155                                     $NextIteration 
00156                               ) , 
00157                               'id = '.$Task->id
00158                         );
00159 
00160                         $this->Database->commit();
00161                   }
00162                   catch( Exception $e )
00163                   {
00164                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00165                   }
00166             }
00167             
00186             function                process_all_tasks( $Tasks )
00187             {
00188                   try
00189                   {
00190                         $Ids = implode_ex( ',' , $Tasks , 'id' );
00191                         
00192                         $this->ScheduleAccess->update( $Ids , array( 'processing' => 1 ) );
00193                         
00194                         $this->Database->unlock();
00195                         
00196                         foreach( $Tasks as $k => $Task )
00197                         {
00198                               $this->process_single_task( $Task );
00199                         }
00200                   }
00201                   catch( Exception $e )
00202                   {
00203                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00204                   }
00205             }
00206             
00221             function                process_tasks()
00222             {
00223                   try
00224                   {
00225                         $this->Database->lock( array( 'umx_schedule' ) , array( 'WRITE' ) );
00226                         
00227                         $this->Settings->load_file( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_schedule_settings' );
00228                         $Tasks = $this->ScheduleAlgorithms->get_tasks( 
00229                               $this->Settings->get_setting( 'processing_tasks_count' , 10 )
00230                         );
00231                         
00232                         if( isset( $Tasks[ 0 ] ) )
00233                         {
00234                               $this->process_all_tasks( $Tasks );
00235                         }
00236                         else
00237                         {
00238                               $this->Database->unlock();
00239                         }
00240                   }
00241                   catch( Exception $e )
00242                   {
00243                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00244                   }
00245             }
00246       }
